# StrSplitP

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of StrSplitP is to add some new features to existing `strsplit` function.

## Installation

You can install the released version of StrSplitP with:

``` r
install.packages("StrSplitP")
devtools::install_github("stat545ubc-2021/functions-Jiangsissi720")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(StrSplitP)
x <- c("3D/MON&SUN")
StrSplitP(x, "", type = "before")
```
